qas.question: What is Plymouth's National Health Service hospital?
In kilometers, how far is Derriford Hospital from the Plymouth city center?
What notable clinic is present in Derriford Hospital?
What organization provides ambulance transport for Plymouth?

answers.text: South Western Ambulance Service NHS Foundation Trust

qas.question: Where is South Western Ambulance Service NHS Foundation Trust headquartered?

context: Plymouth is served by Plymouth Hospitals NHS Trust and the city's NHS hospital is <a0_0>Derriford Hospital<a0_0/> 4 miles (<a1_0>6<a1_0/> km) north of the city centre. The <a2_0>Royal Eye Infirmary<a2_0/> is located at Derriford Hospital. <a3_0>South Western Ambulance Service NHS Foundation Trust<a3_0/> operates in Plymouth and the rest of the south west; its headquarters are in <a4_0>Exeter<a4_0/>.
